More Notes: The quantification of avoided displacement is the reduction in the number of people displaced due to dike construction and nourishment compared to no protection. The 305000 is the high end of the range reported.
Dike and nourishment costs include construction, upgrade, and maintenance, contrasting with no-protection scenarios. 1995 values.
